Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product not only offers unparalleled functionality but also embodies a level of quality and craftsmanship that is truly exceptional. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $150. I trust that you will appreciate its value and enjoy using it for many years to come. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
